mapper.select: SELECT bno, board.userId, writer, title, content, regDate, readCount FROM boarddto as board join memberdto as member on board.userId = member.userId where member.userVerify = 128 ORDER BY bno DESC

SELECT bno, board.userId, writer, title, content, regDate, readCount FROM boarddto as board join memberdto as member on board.userId = member.userId where not member.userVerify = 128 ORDER BY bno DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO boarddto( userId, writer, title, content ) values (#{userId}, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content});
